title: 1000 Mornings at Doherty Hall
headline: A generative data installation that explores how data collection and visualization may be done simultaneously.
description: A generative data installation that explores how data collection and visualization may be done simultaneously.
hero_image: The installation uses simple tactile interactions to collect data from passerbys through prompt-based drawings that follow a preset system. Weâ€™ve collected over 600 responses in its 2 month run across various spots in the CMU campus. The installation has also been adapted for use at the Association of Professional Futures Conference in Houston.
